description: The `v-form` component makes it easy to add validation to form inputs. All input components have a rules prop that can be used to specify conditions in which the input is either valid or invalid.

events.update:modelValue: Event emitted when the form's validity changes.

exposed.errors: Contains all current form input errors.
exposed.isDisabled: Indicates if form is disabled or not.
exposed.isReadonly: Indicates if form is readonly or not.
exposed.isValid: Indicates if form is valid or not.
exposed.isValidating: Indicates if form is currently being validated or not.
exposed.reset: Resets validation of all registered inputs, and clears their values.
exposed.resetValidation: Resets validation of all registered inputs without modifying their values.
